version_description:
◉ Your most requested feature is here! We’ve added an advanced feathering tool with built-in refine edge and auto size calibration.

- Apply feathering to soften the edges of a selection, which is especially useful when working on hard-to-select areas like hair.

- You can switch between an incremental slider (default) and a continuous slider. We recommend using the incremental slider to easily match feathering intensity across different layers in order to achieve a uniform look throughout your composition. You can also tap the increment marks to immediately select a specific intensity level.


If you enjoy Exacto, please take a moment to leave a positive review on the App Store. If you've already left a review, please repost it as reviews are reset with every update. Thanks!

Experiencing issues? Have comments or suggestions for future updates? Please contact us at support@exactoapp.com.

◉ Now you can share your projects with friends or transfer them between your devices.

◉ Now you can save multiple projects to the camera roll directly from the Home screen.

◉ Updated the help tips.

◉ Now you can share your projects with friends or transfer them between your devices.

◉ Now you can save multiple projects to the camera roll directly from the Home screen.

◉ Updated the help tips.


If you enjoy Exacto, please take a moment to leave a positive review on the App Store. If you've already left a review, please repost it as reviews are reset with every update. Thanks!

◉ Introducing snapping! We’ve completely overhauled the app’s transform mechanics to incorporate an advanced snapping tool, the first of its kind for the Pen tool!

- Use snapping to perfectly align neighboring curve segments in order to eliminate sharp corners and form a smooth and continuous selection (adhering to the G1 geometric continuity standard).

- Press the magnet button to turn snapping on.

◉ Optimized for the new iPad Pro 10.5”.

◉ Adopted the App Store’s new in-app rating scheme.

◉ Added haptic feedback throughout the app.

◉ Added a snapping help tip video.

◉ Plenty of under the hood optimizations and performance improvements.

Experiencing issues? Have comments or suggestions for future updates? Please contact us at support@exactoapp.com.
